verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God, why are \w you|strong="H5921"\w* turned \w away|strong="H7837"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*? why are \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* helping \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* words \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* crying?

\w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* make \w my|strong="H4100"\w* cry \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* day, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* give no \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*; \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* night, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* no rest.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* holy, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* seated \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* praises \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Israel.

\w Our|strong="H3478"\w* fathers \w had|strong="H3478"\w* faith \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*: \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* faith \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3427"\w* saviour.

They sent up \w their|strong="H0982"\w* cry \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w you|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* were made free: they \w put|strong="H0982"\w* \w their|strong="H0982"\w* faith \w in|strong="H0982"\w* \w you|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* were not \w put|strong="H0982"\w* \w to|strong="H0001"\w* shame.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w a|strong="H3808"\w* worm \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* man; cursed \w by|strong="H0413"\w* men, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* looked \w down|strong="H0982"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* laughed \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* see \w me|strong="H3808"\w*: pushing \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* lips \w and|strong="H0376"\w* shaking \w their|strong="H3808"\w* heads \w they|strong="H3808"\w* say,

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* put \w his|strong="H3605"\w* faith \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord; let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* saviour now: let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* saviour, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* had delight \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H5337"\w* care \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* birth: \w you|strong="H3588"\w* gave \w me|strong="H0413"\w* faith \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mother's breasts.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0517"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w birth|strong="H0990"\w*; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* time \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0517"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother's \w body|strong="H0990"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0517"\w* not \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* trouble \w is|strong="H0410"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w*; there \w is|strong="H0410"\w* no \w one|strong="H0410"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* give help.

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* great herd \w of|strong="H4480"\w* oxen \w is|strong="H0369"\w* round \w me|strong="H4480"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am shut \w in|strong="H4480"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* strong oxen \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Bashan.
\w I|strong="H0047"\w* saw \w their|strong="H5437"\w* mouths wide open, \w like|strong="H7227"\w* lions crying after food.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am flowing away \w like|strong="H7580"\w* water, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w all|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* place: \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w like|strong="H7580"\w* wax, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H6310"\w* become soft \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* body.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* throat \w is|strong="H3820"\w* dry \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* broken vessel; \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H3820"\w* fixed \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* roof \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dust \w of|strong="H4325"\w* death \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lips.

Dogs \w have|strong="H4194"\w* come round \w me|strong="H8239"\w*: I am shut in by \w the|strong="H4194"\w* band \w of|strong="H4194"\w* evil-doers; they made wounds in my hands \w and|strong="H6083"\w* feet.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* see \w all|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones; \w their|strong="H3588"\w* looks \w are|strong="H3027"\w* fixed \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w*:

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* division \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* robes among \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* decision \w of|strong="H3605"\w* chance \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w take|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* clothing.

Do not be \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, O Lord: O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* strength, \w come|strong="H5307"\w* quickly \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help.

Make \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul safe \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* power \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dog.

\w Be|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* saviour \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* lion's \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*; \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* go free \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* horns \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* cruel oxen.

I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H3467"\w* name \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* brothers: I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H3467"\w* praise among \w the|strong="H3467"\w* people.

\w You|strong="H8432"\w* \w who|strong="H0251"\w* \w have|strong="H0251"\w* fear \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* Lord, give \w him|strong="H5608"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w*; all \w you|strong="H8432"\w* seed \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*, give \w him|strong="H5608"\w* glory; go \w in|strong="H8432"\w* fear \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H5608"\w*, all \w you|strong="H8432"\w* seed \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Israel.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* not \w been|strong="H3605"\w* unmoved \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pain \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* troubled; \w or|strong="H4480"\w* kept \w his|strong="H3605"\w* face covered \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*; \w but|strong="H3513"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given \w an|strong="H4480"\w* answer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* cry.

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* great meeting: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4480"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* worshippers.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* poor \w will|strong="H6951"\w* have a feast \w of|strong="H6951"\w* good things: \w those|strong="H0853"\w* who make search \w for|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H6951"\w* give \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*: \w your|strong="H5048"\w* heart \w will|strong="H6951"\w* have life \w for|strong="H8416"\w* ever.

\w All|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3824"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w all|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* families \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H0398"\w* \w him|strong="H0398"\w* worship.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kingdom \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord's; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ruler \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

All \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fat ones \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w him|strong="H3068"\w* worship; all \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* go \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dust \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* themselves low before \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* enough \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* life \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* soul.

\w A|strong="H0776"\w* seed \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* servant; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* doings \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w clear|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* generation which \w comes|strong="H3381"\w* \w after|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5608"\w* \w will|strong="H0136"\w* come \w and|strong="H5647"\w* \w make|strong="H5647"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* righteousness clear \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w a|strong="H5608"\w* people \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* future \w because|strong="H2233"\w* \w he|strong="H2233"\w* \w has|strong="H0136"\w* done this.
